title: 1767: Dumbbells Vs. Barbells
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin compare the advantages and disadvantages of dumbbells vs. barbells when used with eight different goals in mind. 

  • Comparing the advantages and disadvantages of dumbbells versus barbells, and when appropriate to use with 8 different goals in mind. (2:35)
  • #1 - Range of motion. (4:36)
  • #2 – Overall maximal strength. (8:50)
  • #3 – Central Nervous System (CNS). (11:15)
  • #4 – Aesthetics. (13:01)
  • #5 – Athletics. (16:00)
  • #6 – Muscle imbalances. (19:53)
  • #7 – Explosive power. (24:07)
  • #8 – Upper/lower body. (28:55)
  • Bonus: If you had to pick one to use forever, which would you choose? (32:11)

Related Links/Products Mentioned

  • March Promotion: Limited Time Power Bundle! MAPS Strong and MAPS Powerlift for the low price of $79.99
  • Visit ZBiotics for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!
  • A Brief History of Dumbbells

  • Olympic weightlifting training improves vertical jump height in sportspeople: a systematic review with meta-analysis
  • Mind Pump #1572: Is Tonal Worth The Money? With Aly Orady
